review:
Good evening Marina,

We are sorry that you had a bad experience with us. In fact, this is the first time they have complained about our Bloody Mary. In fact, it is intentionally sour because it is a lightened cocktail made from Tom Yam soup (Thai soup) and tomatoes.
We use Distil # 9 vodka, on which we brew lime kefir leaves (as in the Tom Yam soup recipe).
We try to offer our guests very high quality cocktails. We thank you for the negative feedback, it will help us improve our drinks.

I would like to personally invite you to come another day to try another cocktail that we will offer you and one of your friends ... hoping for a better experience with us!

Sincerely,

Leo Sagel
Owner
